javax.enterprise.inject.spi

Interface Decorator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the decorator bean class
    All Superinterfaces:
    Bean<T>, BeanAttributes<T>, Contextual<T>

    public interface Decorator<T>
extends Bean<T>

    Represents an enabled decorator.

    Author:
    Gavin King, Pete Muir
